title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Load balancing evolved: ALB Target Optimizer (NET336)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 负载均衡的演进：ALB 目标优化器 (NET336)
abstract: Discover an innovative approach to load balancing where targets actively control load distribution. Traditional load balancers use a push model with predefined algorithms, but this new paradigm implements a pull model that empowers targets to manage their own load. Join us to explore how this new mechanism delivers superior application performance and high target efficiency.
abstract_cn: 探索一种创新的负载均衡方法，其中目标主动控制负载分配。传统负载均衡器使用具有预定义算法的推送模型，但这种新范式实现了拉取模型，使目标能够管理自己的负载。加入我们，探索这种新机制如何提供卓越的应用程序性能和高目标效率。
